definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
Lishui prefecture-level city in Zhejiang/Yeosu city in South Jeolla province, Korea, the site of World Expo 2012
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant

sentences.english: Clasp a rare and radiant maiden whom the angels name Lenore.
sentences.chinese: 拥抱被天使叫作丽诺尔的少女，她美丽娇艳。

sentences.english: Audrey hung her head when I shouted at her.
sentences.chinese: 我对奥德丽嚷嚷时她低下了头。

sentences.english: " He reached across the table and took her hand in his own suddenly, squeezing it.
sentences.chinese: 他突然靠向餐桌捉住了丽的手，握在了自己的手中。

sentences.english: I mean Michael's already 3)given up on me and I'm scared Audrey's going to go next.
sentences.chinese: 我是说麦克离开了我，我怕接下来奥德丽也会走。

sentences.english: Then come kiss me, sweet and twenty.
Customarily, I spent the weekends at my aunt Badri's.
sentences.chinese: 我还总是习惯性的在巴德丽姨妈家过周末。

sentences.english: Ms. Jones looked at me, and then turned back to little Ashley.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯夫人看看我，然后转向小阿什丽。

sentences.english: Little Ashley looked at me, her face furious.
sentences.chinese: 小阿什丽盯着我，脸上带着怒气。

sentences.english: So Ashley figured out that she was having sex with the Governor of New York.
sentences.chinese: 阿什丽对此很明确，她跟纽约州州长有一腿。

sentences.english: Liv is a shopping addict, she said that herself.
sentences.chinese: 丽芙是一个购物迷，她自己那么说。

sentences.english: Fair rhea silvia had been shut up in the temple of vesta.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的丽阿？西耳薇娅被幽禁在维斯塔庙里。

sentences.english: Child services finally took her away from her parents.
sentences.chinese: 儿童机构最后将阿什丽从父母身边带走。

sentences.english: Getting into the back seat, Angelique hands you a business card.
sentences.chinese: 坐上后座，安吉丽递给你一张名片。

sentences.english: Audrey looked at me in disbelief.
For some reason this compliment did not please Rei.
sentences.chinese: 不知为何，丽对于这番赞美并不感到高兴。

sentences.english: Without meeting his eyes she turned and walked hurriedly out of the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 丽没有再看真嗣的眼睛，转身快步朝餐厅外走去。

definition: used in the transliteration of people's names
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
